title: BRIEF-Cresco Labs To Acquire Tryke Companies
text:
BRIEF-Cresco Labs To Acquire Tryke Companies

Stock Markets 31 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 07:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cresco Labs To Acquire Tryke Companies Sept 16 (Reuters) - Cresco Labs Inc : * CRESCO LABS TO ACQUIRE TRYKE COMPANIES INCLUDING THE REEF DISPENSARY PORTFOLIO - CONSISTENT WITH STATED PLAN TO ESTABLISH MARKET LEADING POSITIONS IN BOTH NEVADA AND ARIZONA AND BUILD BRAND AND WHOLESALE CAPABILITIES * CRESCO LABS INC - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY US$252.5 MILLION FOR TRYKE OPERATING ASSETS PLUS US$30 MILLION FOR TRYKE REAL ESTATE ASSETS * CRESCO LABS - ENTERED AGREEMENT WITH GROUP OF INVESTMENT DEALERS UNDER WHICH UNDERWRITERS TO BUY UPTO 7.4 MILLION UNITS OF CO AT C$10.00 PER UNIT

BRIEF-Cresco Labs To Acquire Tryke Companies
description: BRIEF-Cresco Labs To Acquire Tryke Companies
